title: really bad attitudes
body: ive been playing league since right after beta and it really seems that the players are getting  much worse in the area of telling people to stfu all game if u say one thing to help team it starts the blaming and the just stfu is all they say then refuse to comm in any other way .. my son who introduced me to the game has stopped playing altogether as well as mot of my freinds who played as long as i have  . i do realize that some people are gonna do this no matter but we players need to realize it is just a game not real life and act in accordance .

replies.body: Yeah, its because the longer Riot lets players treat each other like garbage, the more that becomes normal.  Everyone sees that as being how things work on here after it has been unpunished for so long.  Riot doesn't really care how bad you treat each other, unless you make someone leave the game, then it's all his fault.

The only thing that I find helps is to a good circle of friends and play together.  It won't stop the enemy players from being jerks if they so wish but at least it will resolve the issue at your end.
